# square

**Type Property**

Specifies a square line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

## Declaration

```swift
static let square: CAShapeLayerLineCap
```

## Constants

- **butt**: Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
- **round**: Specifies a round line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.

items.description: Specifies a butt line cap style for endpoints for an open path when stroked.
